response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the ham hock out of the fridge. The robot now has the ham hock and the stockpot in its inventory. The next subtask is to move to the oven.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the ham hock out of the fridge
(3) Move to the oven
(4) Take the stockpot from the oven
(5) Put the ham hock into the stockpot
(6) Cook the ham hock in the stockpot
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Move to the oven
    oven = registry(env,"oven_wuinhm_0")

    donothing(env)
